A new version is available, do you want: Er is een nieuwe versie beschikbaar. Wil je nu bijwerken?
Account It will unlink your account to t: Dit ontkoppelt je account van deze computer.
Address Don't have an account? Request o: Heb je nog geen account? Vraag er hier één aan.
Address Invalid address: Oeps, het adres is onjuist. Om je Twake Workplace te koppelen, moet je de URL ervan invoeren, zoiets als https://lucie.twake.app
Address No Twake Workplace at this addre: Geen Twake Workplace aangetroffen op dit adres!
Address No email address: Je hebt een e-mailadres ingevoerd. Om je Twake Workplace te koppelen, moet je de URL ervan invoeren, zoiets als https://lucie.twake.app
Address This is the web address you use: Dit is het webadres wat je gebruikt om in te loggen op jouw Twake Workplace.
AppUpgrade An error happened during the: An error happened during the upgrade of Twake Desktop. Please contact support at contact@cozycloud.cc.
CGUUpdated Your Twake Workplace hosting: Your Twake Workplace hosting provider informs you that it has updated its Terms of Service (ToS).
CGUUpdated Their acceptance is required: Their acceptance is required to continue using your Twake Workplace.
Your Twake Desktop authorizations have b: Your Twake Desktop authorizations have been revoked
Dashboard Files recently synchronized wi: Files recently synchronized will show up here
Error Bad GLIBCXX version: Je systeem gebruikt een oude versie van glibc; je moet je distributie bijwerken. Bekijk hiervoor https://cozy-labs.github.io/cozy-desktop/doc/usage/linux.html#supported-distributions
Error Check that the note still exists e: Check that the note still exists either on your Twake Workplace or its owner's. This could also mean that the note is out of sync.
Error Your Twake Workplace's disk space: Your Twake Workplace's disk space is saturated
Error The {0} `{1}` could not be written: The {0} `{1}` could not be written to your Twake Workplace because its maximum storage capacity has been reached.
Error Synchronization will resume as soo: Synchronization will resume as soon as you have freed up space (emptied your Trash, deleted unnecessary files...), or increased its capacity.
Error Are you connected to the Internet?: Are you connected to the Internet? You can nevertheless read the content of your note below in degraded mode.
Error Your computer's disk space is insu: Your computer's disk space is insufficient
Error The {0} `{1}` could not be written: The {0} `{1}` could not be written to your computer disk because there is not enough space available.
Error Synchronization will resume as soo: Synchronization will resume as soon as you have freed up space (emptied your Trash, deleted unnecessary files…).
Error Syncdir is empty: Het lijkt erop dat je Twake Desktop-map is geleegd. Bevinden de gegevens zich op een harde schijf die momenteel niet is aangekoppeld? Om gegevensverlies te voorkomen, vindt er geen synchronisatie plaats.
Error Your Twake Workplace could not be: Your Twake Workplace could not be found
Error This note could not be found: This note could not be found
Error The {0} `{1}` has been simultaneou: The {0} `{1}` has been simultaneously modified on your computer and your Twake Workplace.
Error This message persists if Twake Des: This message persists if Twake Desktop is unable to resolve this conflict. In this case rename the version you want to keep and click on "Give up".
Error The {0} `{1}` could not be updated: The {0} `{1}` could not be updated on your computer to apply the changes made on your Twake Workplace.
Error Synchronization will resume as soo: Synchronization will resume as soon as you close the opened file(s) blocking this operation or restore sufficient access rights.
Error The {0} `{1}`'s metadata cannot be: The {0} `{1}`'s metadata cannot be accepted by your Twake Workplace.
Error This message persists if the local: This message persists if the local metadata of your document is corrupted. In this case try to move it out of the Twake Desktop folder and back again or contact support for help on the procedure.
Error The {0} `{1}`'s name contains char: The {0} `{1}`'s name contains characters forbidden by your Twake Workplace.
Error Try renaming it without using the: Try renaming it without using the following characters: / \u{0000} \n \u{000D}.
Error Document path with too many levels: Document path with too many levels
Error The {0} `{1}`'s path has too many: The {0} `{1}`'s path has too many levels (i.e. parent folders) for your Twake Workplace.
Error Try removing some parent levels or: Try removing some parent levels or moving it to antoher folder.
Error Twake Desktop encountered an unexp: Twake Desktop encountered an unexpected error while trying to synchronise the {0} `{1}`.
Error Your hosting provider is working o: Your hosting provider is working on fixing the issue and the synchronization will automatically be retried periodically.
Error The synchronization of your docume: The synchronization of your documents is momentarily paused.
Error It will resume once the maintenanc: It will resume once the maintenance is over.
Error Document path incompatible with cu: Document path incompatible with current OS
Error The {0} `{1}`'s name either contai: The {0} `{1}`'s name either contains forbidden characters or is reserved or is too long for your Operating System.
Error Try renaming it on Twake Drive wit: Try renaming it on Twake Drive without using special characters and choose a shorter name if necessary.
Error The file `{0}` could not be synchr: The file `{0}` could not be synchronized on your Twake Workplace because its size exceeds the maximum allowed of 5 GiB.
Error It will therefore not be synchroni: It will therefore not be synchronized. To stop being notified, you can click on the button below.
Error The name of {0} `{1}` is conflicti: The name of {0} `{1}` is conflicting with an existing document.
Error You need to rename this {0} to sol: You need to rename this {0} to solve the conflict.
Error The remote directory `{0}` was exc: The remote directory `{0}` was excluded from the synchronization on this device.
Error The local directory with the same: The local directory with the same path can either be linked to the remote one which will be synchronized again or be renamed to solve this conflict.
Error Twake Desktop encountered an unexp: Twake Desktop encountered an unexpected error while trying to reach your Twake Workplace.
Error Your hosting provider is working o: Your hosting provider is working on fixing the issue and the synchronization will resume once it is fixed.
Folder You can now synchronize your Twak: You can now synchronize your Twake Workplace with this computer.
Folder By default all the documents on y: By default all the documents on your Twake Workplace will be synchronized.
Folder The documents selected on your Tw: The documents selected on your Twake Workplace will be synchronized on this computer in
Folder You cannot synchronize your data: You cannot synchronize your data directly in
Folder You cannot synchronize your whole: Je kunt niet je hele systeem of persoonlijke map synchroniseren.
Help [ The more you can say about the is: [ Hoe meer je vertelt over het probleem, hoe beter: heb je veel bestanden? Zijn ze groot? Is je Twake Workplace bijgewerkt? ]
Help An error occured while sending your: Er is een fout opgetreden tijdens het versturen. Neem contact op met het ondersteuningsteam.
Help I like a lot what you do, but I hav: Ik vind het heel leuk wat jullie doen, maar ik heb een probleem:
Help Multi Computer: Als je meerdere computers gebruikt i.c.m. deze Twake Workplace, dan helpt het als je óók het logbestand van de andere computers stuurt.
Help Our community grows everyday and wi: Onze gemeenschap groeit elke dag en zal blij zijn je een helpende hand te bieden via één van de volgende media:
Help There are still a few more options: Er zijn nog meer mogelijkheden om contact met ons op te nemen:
Help You can send us feedback, report bu: Je kunt ons feedback sturen, bugs rapporteren en om hulp vragen.
Help Your mail has been sent. We will tr: Je bericht is verstuurd. We proberen zo snel mogelijk te antwoorden!
InvalidConfiguration Please log out and: Please log out and go through the onboarding again or contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc
InvalidDoc Naming rules for each Operati: Naming rules for each Operating System
InvalidDoc File names, extension include: File names, extension included, cannot be more than 256 characters long.
InvalidDoc Folder names cannot be more t: Folder names cannot be more than 243 characters long.
InvalidDoc Document names, extension inc: Document names, extension included, cannot be more than {0} characters long.
InvalidDoc Document paths (i.e. document: Document paths (i.e. document name + all its ancestors' names) cannot be more than {0} characters long.
InvalidDoc Document names cannot include: Document names cannot include the following characters:
InvalidDoc Folder names and file extensi: Folder names and file extensions cannot end with the following characters:
InvalidDoc The following document names: The following document names are forbidden:
Reinitialization - if some document dele: - if some document deletions were not synchronized, these documents will re-appear if you don't delete them beforehand on the other side;
Reinitialization - if some files exist o: - if some files exist on both sides but have different content then conflicts will be created so you can choose the version you wish to keep;
Reinitialization - if some files are onl: - if some files are only present on your Twake Workplace or your computer, they will be added to the other side;
Reinitialization - files already identic: - files already identical on both sides won't be impacted.
Reinitialization Are you sure you want t: Are you sure you want to reinitialize the synchronization?
Revoked In case you didn't, contact us a: Als dat niet het geval is, neem dan contact met ons op via contact@cozycloud.cc
Revoked Synchronization with your Twake: Twake Workplace-synchronisatie is niet beschikbaar. Heb je de machtiging voor deze computer ingetrokken?
Settings A new release is available: Er is een nieuwe versie beschikbaar
Settings Install the new release and res: Installeer de nieuwe versie en herstart de app
Settings Startup: Je Twake Workplace wordt automatisch gesynchroniseerd met je computer
Settings The synchronization of the Twak: The synchronization of the Twake Desktop folder with your Twake Workplace will be entirely rebuilt.
SyncDirEmpty Detail: Om gegevensverlies te voorkomen, vindt er geen synchronisatie plaats. Als je synchronisatie wilt afdwingen, dan kun je je Twake Desktop-map verwijderen.
SyncDirEmpty Message: Het lijkt erop dat je Twake Desktop-map is geleegd. Bevinden de gegevens zich op een harde schijf die momenteel niet is aangekoppeld?
SyncDirUnlinked The client will restart: Om dit te hervatten, moet je een nieuwe Twake Desktop-map kiezen
SyncDirUnlinked Title: Je hebt je Twake Desktop-map verwijderd
SyncDirUnlinked You have removed your sy: Je hebt je Twake Desktop-map verwijderd; synchronisatie is gestopt.
Tray A new release is available: Er is een nieuwe versie beschikbaar
Unlink Detail: Je bestanden worden niet langer gesynchroniseerd met je Twake Workplace.
Unlink Message: Weet je zeker dat je je Twake Workplace wilt ontkoppelen?
Unlinked Else, you can just close Twake: Anders kun je Twake Desktop gewoon afsluiten.
Unlinked If you want to register it agai: Als je het opnieuw wil synchroniseren, dan kun je Twake Desktop herstarten.
Unlinked Your device is no longer regist: Je apparaat is niet langer geregistreerd op je Twake Workplace.
Updater Downloading: Bezig met bijwerken van Twake Desktop
Updater Error ENOSPC: Je schijfruimte is volledig opgebruikt; downloaden is niet mogelijk.
Updater Error EPERM: Bijwerken is niet mogelijk door een machtigingsfout.
Updater Error Other: Er is een onbekende fout opgetreden tijdens het bijwerken. Neem contact op met het ondersteuningsteam.
Updater Please wait: Please wait for the update to be downloaded.
Updater It may take a while: It may take a while, depending on your Internet connection speed.
